Text: Managed to download the torrent and it was indicated as a Win Media Player file but when I try to play it I get an error message saying that WinMediaPlayer does not play this type of file or does not support the codec that was used to compress it,  any suggestions how to solve the problem would be welcome, thanks.
Download and install VLC media player - www.videolan.org  If you searched for ogm in google, you would have seen the first link with the info you need.  When in doubt, search for your answer
